heading: Browse Stories
text: Browse Stories dialog allows users to navigate directories and stories, create new directories, create new stories, open or delete an existing story.

heading: Create New Directory
text: New directory can be created by typing the name in the search field and clicking the icon.

heading: Create New Story
text: Create New Story allows story creation in the selected directory.

heading: Delete the Story
text: Each story is followed with the () button that can be used to delete the story. This function is temporarily disabled in the demo due to our hosting limitations.

heading: Open the Story
text: Story can be opened by clicking on the desired name. Click finish to end this part of the tour. When tour is finished, please open the login story. You'll find the button that can be used to tour the story screen.
